# ML_Track
Track machine learning training and evaluation through mlflow and mail facility.

### Requirements
        pip install mlflow
       
       
### How to Run
        mlflow server #default 5000 port
        
        
Modify mlfowtrack.py as per req012345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474801234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344454647480123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748
